item.title: Matrix Panoramik Single Modular Header Panels

attributes.attribute: The patented PanoramicTM system allows you to create large format seamless graphics. System includes:

Flat fit steel bars that attach to the panel, using hook fastener. Magnetic tape is attached to the graphic for fixing to the bars;Graphic Hanging strip that attaches to the top of the graphic panel using double sided tape. It is then clipped in to the panel extrusion;Magnetic tape not included
Black, Light Grey, Dark Grey, Navy Blue, Silver, White
Modular
10 Year Guarantee
The patented PanoramicTM system allows you to create large format seamless graphics. System includes:

Flat fit steel bars that attach to the panel, using hook fastener. Magnetic tape is attached to the graphic for fixing to the bars;Graphic Hanging strip that attaches to the top of the graphic panel using double sided tape. It is then clipped in to the panel extrusion;Magnetic tape not included
Black, Light Grey, Dark Grey, Navy Blue, Silver, White
Modular
10 Year Guarantee
Matrix Replaceable Graphic frames are available in two styles; Frame Only or with Corex Infills and a large range of standard sizes.
High quality, robust PVC frame available in a choice of 6 colours;Frames are suitable for 5mm thick graphic substrates;Frame is opened using a key (provided free with each order)
Black, Light Grey, Dark Grey, Navy Blue, Silver, White
Modular
10 Year Guarantee
